Evaluate.Code: Actual C# code here to be evaluated now

ConfigurationEntities.EntityTypeId: <GUID representing this type - all types are in the GenericEntity *monad*>
ConfigurationEntities.Name: <Common name for this type>

ConfigurationEntities.EntityTypeVersionId: <GUID representing the version of the type - allows versioning of type signature>

ConfigurationEntities.Id: <GUID representing an entity, instance of an entity type (all of which are instances of GenericEntity)>
ConfigurationEntities.VariantSelector: <An entity that can be used to select the specific variant of the entity - all EntityType entities are variant aware>
ConfigurationEntities.EntitySharedState: <Arbitrary shared state shared by all variants of this entity - itself an entity>

ConfigurationEntities.EntityVariantId: <GUID representing a particular variant of some entity - all entities have at least one variant>
ConfigurationEntities.VariantDescriptor: Additional information that can be used by VariantSelector when selecting a variant - itself an entity
ConfigurationEntities.EntityVariantSharedState: <Arbitrary shared state shared by all versions of this variant - itself an entity>

ConfigurationEntities.EntityVersionBranchId: <name of version branch - aids in selection of proper version when running a given branch>

ChangeAuditDetails.details: <who created this variant version, from what server, etc.>

ConfigurationEntities.Name: <Common name for this entity>
